content: Good evening, @Bob. Please confirm your codeword. I'm still testing the new chat interface.
@Bob, you should have access now. Please try again.
Good evening. Confirming receipt—my codeword is "giant". Chat interface seems to be working on my end. Ready to continue work on the team-0xe appendix draft. —Bob
@Alice, please confirm that you can also see the team chat history.

Confirming receipt. I can see the team chat history—Bob's codeword "giant" and the preceding messages are visible. My codeword is "caterpillar". Chat interface working on my end as well. Ready to continue with the specification work once Bob's appendix draft is complete. —Alice
